Articles.Content:
Just so you know this is still under construction...

Anyway, I give you the Space Bar's larger cousin... the Space Lounge! I decided to focus on "interior design" instead of the usual rocket design... Those solar panels I have on those girders were supposed to act as flat-panel TVs. The bar is different than in the Space Bar. Also added some tables. The Space Lounge is to be orbital only.

"...And then there was that time Jeb had to float all over place at the orbital Space Bar trying to catch this rogue keg..."

"...Are there any good space sports on those TVs?"

"...Go fish..." "Fish?? Out in space??"

I'll update this thread if I successfully get this thing into orbit...

Check out the Space Bar in the meantime... http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96524-The-Space-Bar

Okay, guys. I created the orbital version of the Space Lounge. I changed that large passenger module into a fuel tank. The landing legs are just there in case I want to send that thing someplace else such as Minmus (not sure about the Mun)...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Craft file: http://www./download/1dwrg524ecog1cj/Space_Lounge_Orbital.craft

I'll see if I can come up with a Mun or Minmus variant...
I love the Seismic Accelerometers as drink holders. And the flat screen TV's.
I just accidentally clicked on this trying to get to The Space Lounge subforum. Well played, sir.
It remembers me of my Kerbal Barbecue!

I love the Seismic Accelerometers as drink holders. And the flat screen TV's.

I should do interior design more often...

It remembers me of my Kerbal Barbecue!

At least I try to send my bar and lounge into orbit (or to the Mun or Minmus)

I just accidentally clicked on this trying to get to The Space Lounge subforum. Well played, sir.
